revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (3), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (3)

|brand = Virgin Media |model = Super Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = VMDG485 |page_start_date = 04/19/2014‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Virgin Media Super Hub 2 |wlclass = AN750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VUIUPWL6580 |icid = ACM6234 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ACM6234 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;DNCE2530GU;i(M)(C)07, W248TH872, SLHCZ, DNCE2530GU; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv6 |cpu1_type_rev = (ARMv6TEJ) |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 400 MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Atheros;AR9344;AR9344-BC2A, PKS787.002B, 1306, TAIWAN;; |cpu2_cores = 1 |cpu2_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 560<!-- 560 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S70FL256P0XMFI00; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63JFR-Y5C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 128 |ram2chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR-Y5C; |ram2_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A;AR8035-A, SJ8K4.3D, 1239 CN; |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327;AR8327-AL1A, E4U375.3B, 1305, TAIWAN; |cm_down_c = 8 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.2.0;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, |exp_minipcie_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, dual,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0 |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2598L;SiGe, 2598L, 245BD;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L;SiGe, 5003L, 240FL;3; ,,, Digital Cable Front-End Receiver;MaxLinear;MxL261;MxL, MXL261, SR3H6.16, 1307 00;1; ,,, Cable Modem Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX3520;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Pegatron |manuf_model = ACM6234 |manuf_rev = REV 3.11 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Europe, Japan |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/31/2012 |estreldate = 01/2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344;AR9344-BC2A, PKS787.002B, 1306, TAIWAN;; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Pegatron UPWL6580 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9580;AR9580-AR1A, PNF488.003C, 1301, KOREA; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ACM6234" and "REV: 3.11" is silkscreened on the board in the photos below. :This probably indicates ''[[Pegatron]]'' (''[[ASUS]]'') board manufacture
This device is a ''[[Netgear]]'' CG4000TD (VMDG485) distributed :by ''{{Used by service|Virgin Media}}'' within Europe (''UK'' only?).
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/inbox/toh/virgin.media.superhub.2 ''Virgin Media Super Hub 2 - VMDG485/CG4000TD'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=8603 ''Netgear CG4000TD'' on '''USB JTAG''' forums] (w/ P5 SoC boot log) *[http://cable-wizardz.co.uk/topic/5787-vmdg485-any-ideas/ ''VMDG485, Any Ideas?'' on '''Cable-Wizardz''' forums] (w/ images)<!--[req. forum acct.]-->
===Teardown=== *[https://www.experimental-engineering.co.uk/virgin-media-superhub-2-teardown/ ''Virgin Media Superhub 2 Teardown'' on '''Experimental Engineering'''] *[http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/3410/netgear-super-hub-2-vmdg485-wireless-router-teardown ''Netgear Super Hub 2 VMDG485 Teardown on '''Electronics360'''] :CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TNETC4830ZDWGU - DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 <!-- *TEXAS INSTRUMENTS TNETC4830ZDWGU Cable Modem IC - DOCSIS 3.0, 8-Channel 320Mbps Downstream, :4-Channel 160Mbps Upstream- (Qty: 1) *QUALCOMM ATHEROS AR9344-BC2A WLAN SoC - 802.11n, 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 MIMO, MIPS 74Kc Processor, :5-Port 10/100 Ethernet Switch- (Qty: 1) *PEGATRON UPWL6580 WLAN Half Mini PCIe Module - 802.11a/n, 5GHz, 3x3 MIMO, Qualcomm Atheros AR9580-AR1A (Qty: 1) *QUALCOMM ATHEROS AR8035-A Ethernet Transceiver - Single-Port, 10/100/1000 Base-T- (Qty: 1) *QUALCOMM ATHEROS AR8327-BL1A Ethernet Switch - 7-Port, 10/100/1000BASE-T- (Qty: 1) *SPANSION S70FL256P0XMFI00 Flash - NOR, 256Mb, 3V, 104MHz, SPI (Qty: 1) *SK hynix H5PS5162GFR-Y5C SDRAM - DDR2, 512Mb, 1.8V, 3ns- (Qty: 2) *MAXLINEAR MXL261 Tuner / Demodulator - 2 100MHz Wideband Tuners, 4 QAM Demodulators, :4-Channel Wide IF Output, w/ Intergrated Splitter- (Qty: 1) *BOTHHAND G2PM109N LF Ethernet Magnetics Module - 100/1000 BASE-T, Dual-Port- (Qty: 2) :T-MAC TECHVEST PCB CO., LTD. 4-Layer - FR4, Lead-Free- (Qty: 1) --> *[http://blog.liang.tw/wp-content/uploads/file_uploads/250GB/PEGA/%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c%20%e8%b3%87%e6%96%99/Project%20Introduction_v0.5.pptx ''Powerpoint presentation'' w/ market info @ '''blog.liang.tw''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal + PSU" mode="slideshow"> File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips6.jpg|Puma 5 SoC File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips5.jpg|AR9580 module File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips4.jpg|GbE switch File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips3.jpg|Tuner File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips2.jpg|AR9344 RF File:Netgear vmdg 485 lq chips.jpg|AR9344 + RAM File:Netgear_vmdg_485_lq_psu.jpg|Power supply </gallery></center>{{#set:Has images=internal|Has images=power supply}}
